cast.name: 玛莉亚·奥内托 María Onetto
亚历杭德罗·亚旺达 Alejandro Awada
丹尼尔弗莱雷 Daniel Freire

introduction: Arizona Sur (English language: South Arizona) is a 2004 Argentine comedy film directed and produced by Daniel Pensa and Miguel Angel Rocca and written by Alan Pauls. The film starred Nazareno Casero and Daniel Freire and premiered on 18 January 2004 in Buenos Aires.The film is about a 70 Year old man who touches lives of humans by making women pregnant. The film begins with a 70 Year old women being pregnant and in coma-like situation. Her two sons can not bear this and decide to hunt down the rotten man who has done this to their mother. In this journey the younger of the two brothers makes some observations and has some wild experiences. He discovers that he himself is the son of the absconding father of his would-be sibling. To his astonishment and curiosity he also discovers the gift that this father gives to all his sons- having toes that are joined by skin. On his road trip, the younger brother has some other experiences as well right from meeting an angel-like girl to getting molested in a betting-house. The movie ends with the discovery of the younger son of his absconding father.
